snippet.title: Cublast HD |  Release Trailer
snippet.description:
We are proud to announce that Cublast HD will be released on steam TODAY! 

Make sure to get your copy at http://store.steampowered.com/app/580590

Cublast is a simple and fast paced platformer which takes your nimble navigating and puzzle solving skills to the next level!
Play a wide variety of single player levels or let your friends join in with local co-op and versus! That's not all, as the follow up of the prize winning mobile game, Cublast HD has a built-in level editor and community which allows you to explore your creative ideas and enables you to share these with players all around the world.

Addictive, fast-paced and exciting, Cublast HD has it all!

►The Features
Exciting Game-playLocal Co-op,Versus & Community Maps.
Level Editor, let your creativity go wild and build levels that you then can share with the whole community.
Creative and growing Community
Customization, customise the game to your taste with vibrant themes and accents. 



► Social Media

Website: http://www.cublastgame.com
Studio Website: https://thinkfaststudio.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ThinkFastStudio
Discord: https://discord.gg/gWhs6qm
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ThinkFaster/
Steam Store: http://store.steampowered.com/app/580590/
